name: Enter the Orb
description:
Enter the Orb is a game inspired by the lonely beauty and the futuristic promise of early ‘90s CG animation. You'll play out an experimental 3D-animated movie in three short parts. Each part is its own self-contained animation with its own stylish flair, though the stories may be loosely connected.

You'll need 2 players (can probably be played with more), 30 minutes, and one six-sided die.
